mapper.select: SELECT ps.basic_salary , ps.overtime_pay , ps.meal_pay , ps.ps_bonus , ps.income_tax , ps.local_tax , ps.employment_insurance , ps.health_insurance , ps.nursing_insurance , ps.national_pension , ps.total_payment , ps.actual_salary , TO_CHAR(ps.pay_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS payDate , ps.pay_at , e.empl_position , CASE e.empl_position WHEN '01' THEN '사원' WHEN '02' THEN '대리' WHEN '03' THEN '과장' WHEN '04' THEN '차장' WHEN '05' THEN '부장' ELSE '직급 미정' END AS positionName , d.dept_name , e.empl_nm , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - ps.pay_date >= 30 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS pay_eligible FROM pay_stub ps JOIN employee e ON ps.empl_no = e.empl_no JOIN department d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE ps.empl_no = #{emplNo} AND ps.pay_at = 'Y' ORDER BY ps.pay_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT basic_salary , overtime_pay , meal_pay , ps_bonus , income_tax , local_tax , employment_insurance , health_insurance , nursing_insurance , national_pension , total_payment , actual_salary , TO_CHAR(pay_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS payDate , pay_at , 'Y' AS pay_eligible FROM pay_stub WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND pay_at = 'N' ORDER BY pay_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_stub SET pay_at = 'Y' WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND pay_at = 'N'
